statements.select: SELECT EMPNO, KORNAME EMPNM, PASSWD, DEPT, ORGLEVEL, EMAIL, WEATHER_AREA, DEFUI, TO_CHAR(REGDT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REGDT, DEFUI_KOR, HPTEL, HOMETEL, OFFICETEL, AUTHORITY_ADMIN, AUTHORITY_EQPCHK, AUTHORITY_SIMU, AUTHORITY_COMM, DEPTID, ETC, MGTDAM, SCREENWIDTH, MGTCD FROM DTB_USERINFO WHERE TRIM(EMPNO) = TRIM(#EmpNo#) ORDER BY KORNAME

SELECT A.EMPNO, KORNAME EMPNM, PASSWD, DEPT, ORGLEVEL, EMAIL, WEATHER_AREA, DEFUI, TO_CHAR(REGDT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') REGDT, DEFUI_KOR, HPTEL, HOMETEL, OFFICETEL, AUTHORITY_ADMIN, AUTHORITY_EQPCHK, AUTHORITY_SIMU, AUTHORITY_COMM, DEPTID, ETC, SCREENWIDTH, A.AUTHCODE, C.AUTHNAME, D.LONGITUDE, D.LATITUDE, D.RANGE, A.MGTCD ,CASE WHEN A.MGTCD='0000' THEN 'MAIN' WHEN TRIM(A.MGTCD)='' OR A.MGTCD IS NULL THEN '담당댐없음' ELSE ( SELECT substr(xmlagg(xmlelement(damcd,',' || damcd)).extract('//text()'),2) MGTDAM FROM ( SELECT DAMCD,WKORD, DAMORD, DAMNM FROM HM_DAMMST WHERE MGTCD IN ( SELECT MGTCD FROM HM_DAMMGT A START WITH MGTCD = (SELECT MGTCD FROM DTB_USERINFO WHERE EMPNO=TRIM(#EmpNo#) AND ROWNUM =1) CONNECT BY PRIOR MGTLVL=MGTLVL-1 AND PRIOR MGTCD=PARCD ) ORDER BY WKORD,DAMORD, DAMNM ) ) END AS MGTDAM , (SELECT DAMTP FROM VM_DAMMGT WHERE MGTCD = (SELECT MGTCD FROM DTB_USERINFO WHERE EMPNO=TRIM(#EmpNo#) AND ROWNUM =1)) AS DAMTP , A.HOME FROM DTB_USERINFO A, HM_AUTH_MASTER C, HM_DAMPOINT D WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTHCODE = C.AUTHCODE(+) AND A.MGTDAM = D.DAMCD(+) AND TRIM(A.EMPNO) = TRIM(#EmpNo#) AND A.PASSWD = #PassWD# ORDER BY KORNAME
statements.insert: INSERT INTO HM_LOGIN_INFO(EMPNO, LOGIN_DATE, LOGOUT_DATE, IP) VALUES (#EMPNO#, #LOGIN_DATE#, '', #IP#)
statements.update: UPDATE HM_LOGIN_INFO SET LOGOUT_DATE = #LOGOUT_DATE# WHERE EMPNO = #EMPNO# and LOGIN_DATE = #LOGIN_DATE#
